channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IA

item.title: Report E-2024020006
item.description:
Report E-2024020006

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-05T15:13:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-30
  • City: DAVENPORT
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLEAN HARBORS ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver was offloading at the facility at approximately 1000 and noticed liquid coming from pump manifold. The driver immediately stopped pumping and got a closer look and found a crack in the manifold. This caused a release of less than 1 gallon onto the containment pad. The material was immediately wiped up and disposed of per the regulations.
